name: MailSense AI
tagline: An AI-powered email assistant that helps you communicate more effectively with smart suggestions and automated responses.
description: MailSense AI is an intelligent email assistant that uses advanced artificial intelligence to help you communicate more effectively. It provides smart email suggestions, automated responses, scheduling tools, and communication insights to save you time and improve your email productivity.
shortDescription: Communicate more effectively with AI-powered email suggestions, smart replies, and scheduling tools that save you time every day.

steps.title: Open Gmail
steps.description: In your browser, go to Gmail

steps.title: Google Workspace Marketplace
steps.description: Search for "MailSense AI" in the marketplace

steps.title: Install
steps.description: Click "Install" and follow the authorization prompts

composingEmail.title: Composing an Email
items: Start composing a new email in Gmail
Click the MailSense AI icon in the compose window
Select your communication style and tone
Apply suggestions or customize as needed

smartReplies.title: Smart Replies
items: Automatic: AI suggests replies based on email content
Manual: Click "Suggest Reply" for specific emails
Custom: Train AI with your preferred response styles

scheduling.title: Email Scheduling
items: Schedule emails for optimal delivery times

features.title: Secure Data
features.description: All email data remains in your Google account

features.title: No Data Transmission
features.description: No email content is transmitted to third parties

features.title: Google Compliance
features.description: Full compliance with Google's privacy policy

features.title: Privacy First
features.description: AI processing happens locally when possible

options.title: Support
options.description: Contact us through the add-on interface

meta.title: MailSense AI - AI Email Assistant | Western Software
meta.description: Communicate more effectively with AI-powered email suggestions, smart replies, and scheduling tools that save you time every day.
meta.keywords: AI email assistant, smart replies, email automation, communication AI, email productivity, Gmail add-on
